original: a'arya ma h'a mandra aa nu dh'a ri n'i s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya ma h'a mandra aa nu dh'a ri n'i s'a dha nam /

original: 'phags pa gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'phags pa gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs /

original: 'phags ma gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma zhal gcig pa /

original: phyag g-yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / phyag g-yon pa gnyis na dgra sta dang / zhags pa bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang / mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang / phyag g-yon pa gnyis na dgra sta dang / zhags pa bsnams pa /
translated: In her two right hands she holds a vajra and a boon-granting mudrā, and in her two left hands she holds an axe and a noose.

original: h'um gi sa bon can mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: h'um gi sa bon can mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
translated: She has the seed syllable hūṃ and is crowned with Akṣobhya.

original: nyi ma'i gdan la 'od zer dang ldan pa'o zhes so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gdan la 'od zer dang ldan pa'o zhes so //
translated: She sits on a sun seat and is radiant.

original: 'phags ma gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags ma gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Ārya Mahāmantrānudhāriṇī is complete.
